member.name: T:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Packaging.IPackageFactory
member.summary: Factory class used to create an IPackage given a stream and a FileMode

member.name: M:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Packaging.IPackageFactory.Open(System.IO.Stream,System.IO.FileMode)
member.summary: Opens an IPackage with a given IO stream and file mode.
member.param: The IO stream on which to open the IPackage.
The file mode in which to open the IPackage.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Packaging.IPackage
member.summary: Represents a container that can store multiple data objects.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Packaging.IPackage.CreatePart(System.Uri,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new uncompressed part with a given URI and content type.
member.param: The uniform resource identifier (URI) of the new part.
The content type of the data stream.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Packaging.IPackage.CreateRelationship(System.Uri,Infragistics.Documents.Core.Packaging.RelationshipTargetMode,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a package-level relationship to a part with a given URI, target mode, relationship type, and identifier (ID).
member.param: The uniform resource identifier (URI) of the target part.
Indicates if the target part is System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode.Internal or System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode.External to the package.
A URI that uniquely defines the role of the relationship.
A unique XML identifier.
member.returns: The package-level relationship to the specified part.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Packaging.IPackage.GetRelationships
member.summary: Returns a collection of all the package-level relationships.
member.returns: A collection of all the package-level relationships that are contained in the package.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Packaging.IPackage.GetRelationship(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the relationship that has a specified IPackageRelationship.Id.
member.param: The IPackageRelationship.Id of the relationship to return.
member.returns: The relationship that matches the specified id.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Packaging.IPackage.GetPart(System.Uri)
member.summary: Returns the part with a given URI.
member.param: The uniform resource identifier (URI) of the part to return.
member.returns: The part with the specified partUri.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Packaging.IPackage.GetParts
member.summary: Returns a collection of all the parts in the package.
member.returns: A collection of all the System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart elements that are contained in the package.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Packaging.IPackage.PartExists(System.Uri)
member.summary: Indicates whether a part with a given URI is in the package.
member.param: The System.Uri of the part to check for.
member.returns: true if a part with the specified partUri is in the package; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Packaging.IPackagePart
member.summary: Provides a base class for parts stored in a System.IO.Packaging.Package. This class is abstract.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Packaging.IPackagePart.GetStream(System.IO.FileMode,System.IO.FileAccess)
member.summary: Returns the part content stream opened with a specified System.IO.FileMode and System.IO.FileAccess.
member.param: The I/O mode in which to open the content stream.
The access permissions to use in opening the content stream.
member.returns: The content stream for the part.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Packaging.IPackagePart.CreateRelationship(System.Uri,Infragistics.Documents.Core.Packaging.RelationshipTargetMode,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a part-level relationship between this IPackagePart to a specified target IPackagePart or external resource.
member.param: The URI of the target part.

One of the enumeration values. For example, RelationshipTargetMode.Internal if the target part is inside the IPackage; or RelationshipTargetMode.External if the target is a resource outside the IPackage.
The role of the relationship.
A unique ID for the relationship.
member.returns: The part-level relationship between this IPackagePart to the target IPackagePart or external resource.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Packaging.IPackagePart.GetRelationships
member.summary: Returns a collection of all the relationships that are owned by this part.
member.returns: A collection of all the relationships that are owned by the part.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Packaging.IPackagePart.GetRelationship(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the relationship that has a specified IPackageRelationship.Id.
member.param: The IPackageRelationship.Id of the relationship to return.
member.returns: The relationship that matches the specified id.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Packaging.IPackagePart.Package
member.summary: Gets the parent Package of the part.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Packaging.IPackagePart.Uri
member.summary: Gets the URI of the part.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Packaging.IPackagePart.ContentType
member.summary: Gets the MIME type of the content stream.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Packaging.IPackageRelationship
member.summary: Represents an association between a source IPackage or IPackagePart, and a target object which can be a IPackagePart or external resource.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Packaging.IPackageRelationship.SourceUri
member.summary: Gets the URI of the package or part that owns the relationship.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Packaging.IPackageRelationship.TargetUri
member.summary: Gets the URI of the target resource of the relationship.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Packaging.IPackageRelationship.Id
member.summary: Gets a string that identifies the relationship.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Packaging.IPackageRelationship.RelationshipType
member.summary: Gets the qualified type name of the relationship.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Packaging.IPackageRelationship.TargetMode
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the target of the relationship is RelationshipTargetMode.Internal or RelationshipTargetMode.External to the IPackage.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Packaging.RelationshipTargetMode
member.summary: Specifies whether the target of an IPackageRelationship is inside or outside the IPackage.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Packaging.RelationshipTargetMode.Internal
member.summary: The relationship references a part that is inside the package.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Packaging.RelationshipTargetMode.External
member.summary: The relationship references a resource that is external to the package.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Packaging.ContentTypeSaveHandler
member.summary: Defines the signature of the method called by the static CreatePartInPackage method to save data to the content type handler.
member.param: The serialization manager, e.g., Excel2007WorkbookSerializationManager
The stream to which the data is serialized.
Signifies to the caller whether the stream should be closed after execution returns. Unless the implementing part supports realtime streaming, true should be returned.
Signifies to the caller whether the partRelationshipsCounter stack should be popped after execution returns from the Save method.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Packaging.IContentType
member.summary: Used to decouple the PackageUtilities.CreatePartInPackage method from any specific type, for example, so ContentTypeBase-derived classes can use it as well as WordContentTypeExporterBase-derived classes.
